home.title: Age Calculator Application
home.description: Enter your birth date to find out your current age

errors.futureDate: Birth date cannot be in the future

ageExpressions.title: Age Expressions
ageExpressions.variant3: You have aged {{years}} years and {{months}} months.
ageExpressions.variant5: Next year on {{nextBirthday}} you will turn {{nextAge}} years old.
ageExpressions.variant6: You are in your {{age}}th spring of life.
ageExpressions.variant7: You have {{years}} years, {{months}} months, and {{days}} days of life experience.
ageExpressions.variant10: Your next birthday is on {{nextBirthday}}, {{daysUntilBirthday}} days away.
ageExpressions.variant11: You are {{years}} years and {{months}} months old.

planetaryAges.title: Your Age on Other Planets
planetaryAges.subtitle: Discover how old you would be on other planets in our solar system

consent.title: Privacy and Cookies
consent.description: This app uses cookies and personalized ads to enhance your experience. By continuing, you accept our <link>Privacy Policy</link>.

optOut.title: Disable personalized advertisements
optOut.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to disable personalized advertisements? This will reload the page.

optOutPage.title: Opt Out of Ads
optOutPage.description: This app shows personalized ads to enhance your experience. If you want to disable personalized ads, you can follow these steps:

mobileSteps.step1: Click on the "Opt Out of Ads" link at the bottom of the app

optOutPage.contactText: If you have questions about privacy matters, you can contact us:

consentBanner.title: Cookies and Privacy
consentBanner.description: This app uses cookies to improve your experience. By continuing, you agree to the use of cookies.
